title: Wedding CEREMONY
description: You are getting married But I stand to capture every scene of your wedding. A marriage ceremony or wedding ceremony is an event where two people are united in marriage. The wide variation is observed in marriage rituals and customs across cultures, tribes, religions, countries and social classes. Most marriage ceremonies are completed by the couple's acceptance of matrimonial confessions, the giving of gifts (rings, symbolic objects, flower money), and the public announcement of the marriage by the respective recognized persons. Special costumes are often worn during the event, and the ceremony is often followed by a ceremony called Baubhat. Besides, the ceremonies usually include singing and reciting of poems and special prayers for the future welfare and prosperity of the couple or recitation of passages from religious manuscripts or literature. And in all these cases I can be a perfect click for you.

title: YOU DESERVE AN UNFORGETTABLE DAY
